segments.text: Watching the boy reach into the cookie jar, I feel a sense of frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s being reckless, and it’s nerve-wracking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at him to get down before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s obliviousness to the chaos is infuriating too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the puddle growing at her feet, yet she’s so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost as if the chaos in the kitchen is a reflection of her own distractions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children’s excitement feels misplaced when safety is at stake.
segments.speaker: PAR
